title: Private life of a cat
brief_description: The animal’s outlook on life. The camera lens has been treated as the eyes of a mother cat, observing the daily details of life in a feline family. Thus, an ordinary room becomes an immense foreign environment, in which is enacted the drama of birth - a sequence now celebrated as one of the the most unusual in film literature.
